function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerability of data leading to espionage and financial exploitation","Impact":"Compromised availability and integrity of data","Mitigation":"Enhanced data security measures and encryption","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage","People":"City users, residents, government agencies, third parties","Owner":"IT security professionals, government agencies"},{"Description":"Physical damage to installed devices and systems due to data access","Impact":"Disruption of data collection and relaying to relevant authorities","Mitigation":"Implement physical security measures for devices and systems","Technologies":"CCTV surveillance, access control systems","People":"City users, residents, relevant authorities","Owner":"Facility management, security professionals"},{"Description":"Fear and discomfort among citizens due to surveillance and data privacy concerns","Impact":"Negative effects on citizen participation and urban comfort","Mitigation":"Transparency in data collection and use, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, public information platforms","People":"City users, residents, government agencies, private companies","Owner":"City authorities, public relations professionals"}]}
